***
Merge the count_gene with human genes annotation df on gene_id s

```{r}
counts_diff <- merge(human_genes, counts_gene, 
                   by.x = "gene_id",
                   # In case your transcript name column is not target_id,
                   # you should change this line below
                   by.y = "gene_id")
```

```{r}

counts_differential <- group_by(counts_diff, gene_name) %>%
  dplyr::select(-gene_id)%>%
  summarize_all(sum)

```

```{r}
# Drop the gene name column
counts_d <- as.data.frame(counts_differential[ , -1])
row.names(counts_d) <- counts_differential$gene_name

head(counts_d)
```
